mapper.select: SELECT t.id, concat(t.rent_year, '年', t.rent_month, '月') AS rentMonth, t.must_charge, t.actual_charge, t.arrears, CASE t.is_enable WHEN 1 THEN '正常' WHEN 2 THEN '未启用(合同未审核)' WHEN 3 THEN '合同取消' END AS rentStatus FROM money_rent_must t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.fk_deal_id = #{id}

SELECT datediff(max(t.rent_date), date(#{date})) * (t2.real_rent_charge / 30) FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t1.id = t.fk_deal_id LEFT JOIN house_resource t2 ON t1.fk_house_resource_id = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id} AND t.is_enable = 1

SELECT t1.deal_serial, t1.deal_name, t2.resource_name, t3.name AS renter, concat(t.rent_year, '年', t.rent_month, '月') AS rentMonth, t.must_charge, to_days(t.rent_date) - to_days(now()) AS lastDay FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t2 ON t1.fk_house_resource_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN renter t3 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t3.id WHERE DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY) >= t.rent_date AND t.is_enable = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT group_concat(concat(t5.name, t4.park, t4.build_no, '号楼', t4.build_level, '层', t4.build_room) SEPARATOR ',') AS houseLocation, t5.name AS agency, t6.name AS renter, t.id AS payId, date(t1.start_time) AS date, concat('合同保证金') AS reason, t.deposit AS money FROM money_deposit_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t3 ON t3.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t4 ON t3.fk_house_resource_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t4.fk_agency_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN renter t6 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t6.id WHERE month(t1.start_time) = month(#{cd.date})
UNION ALL SELECT group_concat(concat(t5.name, t4.park, t4.build_no, '号楼', t4.build_level, '层', t4.build_room) SEPARATOR ',') AS houseLocation, t5.name AS agency, t6.name AS renter, t.id AS payId, date(t.rent_date) AS date, concat(date(t.rent_date),'-后',t1.pay_type,'月租金') AS reason, t.must_charge AS money FROM money_rent_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t3 ON t3.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t4 ON t3.fk_house_resource_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t4.fk_agency_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN renter t6 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t6.id WHERE month(t.rent_date) = month(#{cd.date})
UNION ALL SELECT group_concat(concat(t5.name, t4.park, t4.build_no, '号楼', t4.build_level, '层', t4.build_room) SEPARATOR ',') AS houseLocation, t5.name AS agency, t6.name AS renter, t.id AS payId, date(now()) AS date, concat(year(now()),'-前往年欠款') AS reason, t.arrears AS money FROM money_arrears_must t LEFT JOIN deal t1 ON t.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN mid_deal_house t3 ON t3.fk_deal_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN house_resource t4 ON t3.fk_house_resource_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN dic_agency t5 ON t4.fk_agency_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN renter t6 ON t1.fk_renter_id = t6.id WHERE year(now()) = year(#{cd.date})) a WHERE a.houseLocation IS NOT NULL
